GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
driver core: fix potential deadlock in __driver_attach

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 733ab0c19bf17f6ad7c2b580ede006e369d5ab1b, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit ef0ff68351be4fd83bec2d797f0efdc0174a55a4. For more details please see the references link.
